name: crm
description: CRM TypeScript React monorepo with Drizzle, Hono, and Turbo

scripts.clean: turbo clean && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -rf .pnpm-store
